Services

Virtual Toowee will take care of the admin and streamline your systems. See below for the types of services available and if you need something more bespoke, please get in touch.

Admin Support

  • Date entry
  • Transcription
  • Database management
  • Word document creation
  • Spreadsheet creation & editing
  • Online research
  • Draft correspondences
  • Reports and agendas

Email & Diary Management

  • Email monitoring
  • Diary management
  • Organise meetings & calls
  • Booking meeting rooms
  • Event support

Online Support

  • Website content management
  • Social media management (including Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Instagram)
  • Setting up & writing email newsletters
  • Scheduling content
  • Creating online forms

Design

  • Brochures
  • Leaflets
  • Flies
  • Posters
  • Print newsletters
  • Image manipulation

Personal Support

  • Booking appointments
  • Utility bill comparison
  • Household admin
  • Restaurant/holiday research & booking
  • Travel planning & itinerary creation
  • eBay sales assistance

Project Management

  • Implementation and maintenance of online project management systems
  • Streamline electronic filing systems
  • Project support
